definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: I ate a few minutes ago.
sentences.chinese: 吃了，我幾分鐘前吃了飯。

sentences.english: It is a jiffy after three.
This is an intersting job, but kind of dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 這是一項令人興奮的工作，但有幾分危險。

sentences.english: We strongly recommend that you now take a moment to read this safety card before take-off.
sentences.chinese: 我們強烈建議您花幾分鐘時間在起飛前閱讀安全卡片。

sentences.english: Hello and welcome to Trend UK, your shortcut to popular culture from the British Council. In the next few minutes we’re going to be talking about modern manners.
sentences.chinese: 在接下來的幾分鐘裏，我們將要討論的是現代禮儀。

sentences.english: In addition, the inscription on precipices in Ming dynasty also add somewhat majesty to the ancient shut fortress.
sentences.chinese: 明代摩崖石刻也給古關要塞增添了幾分威嚴。

sentences.english: "I just came for a few minutes to ask when she is coming home, " he explained.
sentences.chinese: “我剛來了幾分鐘去問，當她回家了，”他解釋說。

sentences.english: Just then an old man came and helped me. A few minutes later, he mended the bike well.
sentences.chinese: 這時一個老邁爺走過來幫我，幾分鐘後車修好了。

sentences.english: What is the percentage of scouts to the total members of the four uniform teams?
sentences.chinese: 童軍的人數佔這四個制服團體總人數的幾分之幾？

sentences.english: I would like a word with you. Can you spare me a few minutes?
sentences.chinese: 我想同你說句話。你能給我勻出幾分鐘嗎？

sentences.english: We should open the windows for a minute every day.
sentences.chinese: 我們每天都要開窗戶幾分鐘。

sentences.english: You've tried setting your watch several minutes ahead, but you're still late.
sentences.chinese: 你已經把手錶調快了幾分鐘，可你還是遲到了。

sentences.english: Minutes later, we cast off and headed offshore in a southerly direction.
sentences.chinese: 幾分鐘以後，我們啓航向南駛去。

sentences.english: Wait a few minutes, and then click the Redial button.
sentences.chinese: 等待幾分鐘後單擊“重撥”按鈕。

sentences.english: At first, he only remained a few minutes with Cosette, and then went away.
sentences.chinese: 開始時他只和珂賽特在一起待上幾分鐘就走了。

sentences.english: But leave it for a few minutes and then taste it again.
sentences.chinese: 他狡猾地笑道，“但等幾分鐘，再嚐嚐看。”
